name: Shraddha Rehabilitation Foundation

address: Opp Eskay Club, Off New Link Road, Borivali (W)

briefDescription: Shraddha is perhaps the only one of its kind in India, which rescues, provides treatment, custodial care and rehabilitation to a neglected group of mentally â€“ ill roadside destitute and reunites them with their lost families. Since 1988, when we have started the NGO more than 4500 destitutes have been picked up, treated, and reunited (after recovery). And since the inception of the Karjat project in 2006, 2795 wandering mentally ill roadside destitutes have been reunited, and more particularly we have have been instrumental in rescuing, treating and reuniting after rehabilitation 770 female wandering mentally ill roadside destitutes.
